channel.title: Comments on: Episode 23 – Holiday Minisode 1: Tablets vs. Laptops
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description: No, not exactly. We love comments, but the review is supposed to be in iTunes. <a href="http://dmbl.co/itunes" title="iTunes - Podcasts - Deemable Tech" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Click here to go to the Deemable Tech's page in iTunes</a>, then click View in iTunes. Then, once iTunes loads, click Subscribe and then you can put in a review on the podcast in iTunes.
item.content:encoded: No, not exactly. We love comments, but the review is supposed to be in iTunes. Click here to go to the Deemable Tech’s page in iTunes, then click View in iTunes. Then, once iTunes loads, click Subscribe and then you can put in a review on the podcast in iTunes.

item.title: By: Jerry Wetzel
item.dc:creator: Jerry Wetzel
item.description: Ray I assume this is where we leave a review, I did not see a spot. Im glad you touched on tablets, I hope consumers keep an open mind as to what device meets his or her specific need.
item.content:encoded: Ray I assume this is where we leave a review, I did not see a spot. Im glad you touched on tablets, I hope consumers keep an open mind as to what device meets his or her specific need.
